metadata.title: CVE-2023-28639 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 0.85 and prior to versions 9.5.13 and 10.0.7, a malicious link canbe crafted by an unauthenticated user. It will be able to exploit areflected XSS in case any authenticated user opens the crafted link. Thisissue is fixed in versions 9.5.13 and 10.0.7.

criterions.comment: glpi package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
